actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

official_title: A bill to provide that food stamp adjustments for the elderly and disabled are coordinated with cost-of-living adjustments.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to exclude from the income of an eligible household through September 30 of any fiscal year, any increase in income attributable to a cost-of-living increase in: (1) Old Age, Survivors and Disability payments; (2) supplemental security income; (3) railroad retirement payments; or (4) veterans' pension payments.

titles.title: A bill to provide that food stamp adjustments for the elderly and disabled are coordinated with cost-of-living adjustments.
